sans-with-fallback.description: The Official Brand Typeface + Fallback Font Stacks (TBA])

100.description: Buttons, navigation, and text not meant to break over a line

200.description: Headings, introductory (lede/lead or dek/subhead) text, no more than 1-2 sentences

300.description: Short text (under 1 paragraph), captions, text with a very short or very long measure

400.description: Short (1-2 paragraphs) of running text, especially with a short measure

500.description: A good choice for most reading text, especially text meant for extended reading

600.description: Shorter text (1-2 paragraphs) meant to be distinguished from other page text, pullquotes

bottom.description: Use bottom z-index to stack something behind everything else

default.description: Use default z-index for components and elements inside components

sticky.description: Default z-index for sticky interface elements

overlay.description: Default z-index for modal and popup overlays

loader.description: Default z-index for loaders (spinners), stacking on top of overlay

popover.description: Default z-index for popovers (popouts) that stacks on top of all other elements

modal.description: Default z-index for modals that stacks on top of overlays and other elements, but still allows popovers to be visible

none.description: To set the width between grid columns (i.e. gutter) to zero

fixed.description: To set the width between grid columns to a fixed size no matter the viewport width

fluid.description: To set the width between grid columns to change based on viewport width

none.description: To set the margins at the outer edge of the grid (or content) container to zero

fixed.description: To set the margins at the outer edge of the grid (or content) container to a fixed size no matter the viewport width

fluid.description: To set the margins at the outer edge of the grid (or content) container to change based on viewport width

default.description: Used for standard text and body copy

subdued.description: Used for secondary or less important text, such as captions or disclaimers

inverted.description: Used for text that appears on a dark or colored background

informative.description: Used for text that provides additional information, such as help text or tooltips

positive.description: Used for text that conveys a positive message or success state

warning.description: Used for text that warns the user of a potential issue or problem

negative.description: Used for text that conveys a negative message or error state

strong.description: Used for emphasizing important information, such as headings or calls to action

primary.description: Used for text that appears on a background with the fill of the primary color

neutral.description: Used for text that appears on a background with a fill of the neutral color

emphasis.description: Used for text that appears on a background with a fill of the emphasize color

accent.description: Used for text that appears on a background with a fill of the accent color

informative.description: Used for text that appears on a background that provides additional information.

positive.description: Used for text that appears on a background that conveys a positive message or success state

warning.description: Used for text that appears on a background that warns the user of a potential issue or problem

negative.description: Used for text that appears on a background that conveys a negative message or error state.

default.description: Default icon color used throughout the system.

subdued.description: A more subtle version of the default icon color, used for secondary or less important icons

inverted.description: Used for icons that appear on darker backgrounds.

informative.description: Used for icons that convey neutral or informative content.

positive.description: Used for icons that convey positive or success-related content.

warning.description: Used for icons that convey warning or caution-related content.

negative.description: Used for icons that convey negative or error-related content.

strong.description: A more bold version of the default icon color, used for primary or more important icons

primary.description: Used for icons that appear on the primary color

neutral.description: Used for icons that appear on the neutral color

emphasis.description: Used for icons that appear on the emphasize color

accent.description: Used for icons that appears on the accent color

informative.description: Used for icons that appear on the informative color

positive.description: Used for icons that appear on the positive color

warning.description: Used for icons that appear on the warning color

negative.description: Used for icons that appear on the negative or error-related color

default.description: Used for primary color borders on non-actionable elements such as table-cells, modals etc.

subdued.description: Used for subdued primary color borders on non-actionable elements such as table-cells, modals etc.

strong.description: Used for strong primary color borders on non-actionable elements such as table-cells, modals etc.

strong.description: Strong border color for warning or alert elements.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of primary actions such as call to actions, buttons, drop-downs, tabs etc.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of primary actions such as call to actions, buttons, drop-downs, tabs etc.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of primary actions such as call to actions, buttons, drop-downs, tabs etc.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of primary actions such as call to actions, buttons, drop-downs, tabs etc.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of neutral actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of secondary actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of secondary actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of secondary actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of emphasized elements such as buttons of high-priority / commitment.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of emphasized elements such as buttons of high-priority / commitment.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of emphasized elements such as buttons of high-priority / commitment.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of emphasized elements such as buttons of high-priority / commitment.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of accented actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of accented actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of accented actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of negative elements such as buttons with a destructive function.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of negative elements such as buttons with a destructive function.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of negative elements such as buttons with a destructive function.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of negative elements such as buttons with a destructive function.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of actionable elements that are placed on lighter imagery, assets or colored layers.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of actionable elements that are placed on lighter imagery, assets or colored layers.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of actionable elements that are placed on lighter imagery, assets or colored layers.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of interactable elements such as toggles, scrollbars etc.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of interactable elements such as toggles, scrollbars etc.

default.description: Primary color background for non-interactable elements, sections, modals etc,

strong.description: Moderate primary color background for non-interactable elements, sections, modals etc,

default.description: Default background color.

subdued.description: Background color for subtle distinction from the default background color.

strong.description: Background color for stronger distinction from the default background color.

inverted.description: Inverted default background color (e.g. for toast notifications).

enabled.description: Default background color for the enabled state of interactable elements.

pressed.description: Default background color for the pressed state of interactable elements.

hovered.description: Default background color for the hover state of interactable elements.

selected.description: Default background color for the pressed state of interactable elements.

disabled.description: Default background color for the disabled state of interactable elements.

default.description: Default or base layer of the layer stack used to manage visual hierarchy of background elements in a layout.

enabled.description: Used as enabled state of the 1st layer in the layer stack.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 1st layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 1st layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 1st layer in the layer stack.

default.description: The 2nd layer of the layer stack and to be used behind the 1st layer in the layer stack order.

enabled.description: Used as enabled state of the 2nd layer in the layer stack.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 2nd layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 2nd layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 2nd layer in the layer stack.

default.description: The 3rd layer in the layer stack and to be used behind the 2nd layer in the layer stack order.

enabled.description: Used as enabled state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

default.description: The 4th layer in the layer stack and to be used behind the 3rd layer in the layer stack order.

enabled.description: Used as enabled state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

subdued.description: Background color for subtle distinction from the default background color.

default.description: Default or base layer of the layer stack used to manage visual hierarchy of background elements in a layout.

enabled.description: Used as enabled state of the 1st layer in the layer stack.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 1st layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 1st layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 1st layer in the layer stack.

default.description: The 2nd layer of the layer stack and to be used behind the 1st layer in the layer stack order.

enabled.description: Used as enabled state of the 2nd layer in the layer stack.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 2nd layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 2nd layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 2nd layer in the layer stack.

default.description: The 3rd layer in the layer stack and to be used behind the 2nd layer in the layer stack order.

enabled.description: Used as enabled state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

default.description: The 4th layer in the layer stack and to be used behind the 3rd layer in the layer stack order.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

Semi-transparent background, which can be applied behind modals to provide focus.

none.description: To set the width between grid columns (i.e. gutter) to zero

fixed.description: To set the width between grid columns to a fixed size no matter the viewport width

fluid.description: To set the width between grid columns to change based on viewport width

none.description: To set the margins at the outer edge of the grid (or content) container to zero

fixed.description: To set the margins at the outer edge of the grid (or content) container to a fixed size no matter the viewport width

fluid.description: To set the margins at the outer edge of the grid (or content) container to change based on viewport width

default.description: Used for standard text and body copy

subdued.description: Used for secondary or less important text, such as captions or disclaimers

strong.description: Used for emphasizing important information, such as headings or calls to action

inverted.description: Used for text that appears on a dark or colored background

informative.description: Used for text that provides additional information, such as help text or tooltips

positive.description: Used for text that conveys a positive message or success state

warning.description: Used for text that warns the user of a potential issue or problem

negative.description: Used for text that conveys a negative message or error state

primary.description: Used for text that appears on a background with the fill of the primary color

neutral.description: Used for text that appears on a background with a fill of the neutral color

emphasis.description: Used for text that appears on a background with a fill of the emphasize color

accent.description: Used for text that appears on a background with a fill of the accent color

informative.description: Used for text that appears on a background that provides additional information.

positive.description: Used for text that appears on a background that conveys a positive message or success state

warning.description: Used for text that appears on a background that warns the user of a potential issue or problem

negative.description: Used for text that appears on a background that conveys a negative message or error state.

strong.description: A more bold version of the default icon color, used for primary or more important icons

positive.description: Used for icons that convey positive or success-related content.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 2nd layer in the layer stack.

default.description: The 3rd layer in the layer stack and to be used behind the 2nd layer in the layer stack order.

enabled.description: Used as enabled state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

default.description: The 4th layer in the layer stack and to be used behind the 3rd layer in the layer stack order.

enabled.description: Used as enabled state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

default.description: Complimentary color to the neutral and primary background colors.

subdued.description: Muted complimentary color to the neutral and primary background colors.

strong.description: Strong complimentary color to the neutral and primary background colors.

default.description: Highlighted color background.

subdued.description: Muted highlight color background.

strong.description: Highly emphasized color background.

default.description: Default background color for informative elements

subdued.description: Subdued background color for informative elements

strong.description: Prominent background color for informative elements

default.description: Default background color for positive or success-related elements

subdued.description: Sbudued background color for positive or success-related elements

strong.description: Prominent background color for positive or success-related elements

default.description: Default background color for warning or alert-related elements

subdued.description: Subdued background color for warning or alert-related elements

strong.description: Prominent background color for warning or alert-related elements

default.description: Default background color for negative or destructive elements

subdued.description: Subdued background color for negative or destructive elements

strong.description: Prominent background color for negative or destructive elements

default.description: Semi-transparent background, which can be applied behind modals to provide focus.
Color intended to highlight elements when they are tabbed to or focused.

none.description: To set the width between grid columns (i.e. gutter) to zero

fixed.description: To set the width between grid columns to a fixed size no matter the viewport width

fluid.description: To set the width between grid columns to change based on viewport width

none.description: To set the margins at the outer edge of the grid (or content) container to zero

fixed.description: To set the margins at the outer edge of the grid (or content) container to a fixed size no matter the viewport width

fluid.description: To set the margins at the outer edge of the grid (or content) container to change based on viewport width

default.description: Used for standard text and body copy

subdued.description: Used for secondary or less important text, such as captions or disclaimers

strong.description: Used for emphasizing important information, such as headings or calls to action

inverted.description: Used for text that appears on a dark or colored background

informative.description: Used for text that provides additional information, such as help text or tooltips

positive.description: Used for text that conveys a positive message or success state

warning.description: Used for text that warns the user of a potential issue or problem

negative.description: Used for text that conveys a negative message or error state

primary.description: Used for text that appears on a background with the fill of the primary color

neutral.description: Used for text that appears on a background with a fill of the neutral color

emphasis.description: Used for text that appears on a background with a fill of the emphasize color

accent.description: Used for text that appears on a background with the fill of the accent color

informative.description: Used for text that appears on a background that provides additional information.

positive.description: Used for text that appears on a background that conveys a positive message or success state

warning.description: Used for text that appears on a background that warns the user of a potential issue or problem

negative.description: Used for text that appears on a background that conveys a negative message or error state.

default.description: Default icon color used throughout the system.

subdued.description: A more subtle version of the default icon color, used for secondary or less important icons

strong.description: A more bold version of the default icon color, used for primary or more important icons

inverted.description: Used for icons that appear on darker backgrounds.

informative.description: Used for icons that convey neutral or informative content.

positive.description: Used for icons that convey positive or success-related content.

warning.description: Used for icons that convey warning or caution-related content.

negative.description: Used for icons that convey negative or error-related content.

primary.description: Used for icons that appear on the primary color

neutral.description: Used for icons that appear on the neutral color

emphasis.description: Used for icons that appear on the emphasize color

accent.description: Used for icons that appear on the accent color

informative.description: Used for icons that appear on the informative color

positive.description: Used for icons that appear on the positive color

warning.description: Used for icons that appear on the warning color

negative.description: Used for icons that appear on the negative or error-related color

default.description: Used for primary color borders on non-actionable elements such as table-cells, modals etc.

subdued.description: Used for subdued primary color borders on non-actionable elements such as table-cells, modals etc.

strong.description: Used for strong primary color borders on non-actionable elements such as table-cells, modals etc.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of primary color borders on interactable elements such as buttons

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of primary color borders on interactable elements such as buttons

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of primary color borders on interactable elements such as buttons

default.description: Used for neutral borders on non-actionable elements such as table-cells, modals etc.

subdued.description: Used for subdued neutral borders on non-actionable elements such as table-cells, modals etc.

strong.description: Used for strong neutral borders on non-actionable elements such as table-cells, modals etc.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of neutral borders on interactable elements such as buttons

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of neutral borders on interactable elements such as buttons

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of neutral borders on interactable elements such as buttons

default.description: Default border color for informative elements.

subdued.description: Subdued border color for informative elements.

strong.description: Strong border color for informative elements.

enabled.description: Enabled border color for informative elements.

hovered.description: Hovered border color for informative elements.

pressed.description: Pressed border color for informative elements.

default.description: Default border color for positive or success elements.

subdued.description: Subdued border color for positive or success elements.

strong.description: Strong border color for positive or success elements.

enabled.description: Enabled border color for positive or success elements.

hovered.description: Hovered border color for positive or success elements.

pressed.description: Pressed border color for positive or success elements.

default.description: Default border color for warning or alert elements.

subdued.description: Subdued border color for warning or alert elements.

strong.description: Strong border color for warning or alert elements.

enabled.description: Enabled border color for warning or alert elements.

hovered.description: Hovered border color for warning or alert elements.

pressed.description: Pressed border color for warning or alert elements.

default.description: Default border color for negative or error elements.

subdued.description: Subdued border color for negative or error elements.

strong.description: Strong border color for negative or error elements.

enabled.description: Enabled border color for negative or error elements.

hovered.description: Hovered border color for negative or error elements.

pressed.description: Pressed border color for negative or error elements.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of primary actions such as call to actions, buttons, drop-downs, tabs etc.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of primary actions such as call to actions, buttons, drop-downs, tabs etc.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of primary actions such as call to actions, buttons, drop-downs, tabs etc.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of primary actions such as call to actions, buttons, drop-downs, tabs etc.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of neutral actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of secondary actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of secondary actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of secondary actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of emphasized elements such as buttons of high-priority / commitment.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of emphasized elements such as buttons of high-priority / commitment.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of emphasized elements such as buttons of high-priority / commitment.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of emphasized elements such as buttons of high-priority / commitment.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of accented actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

hovered.description: Used for the hovered state of accented actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of accented actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of accented actions such as toggleable buttons or on-page navigation.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of negative elements such as buttons with a destructive function.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of negative elements such as buttons with a destructive function.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of negative elements such as buttons with a destructive function.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of negative elements such as buttons with a destructive function.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of actionable elements that are placed on lighter imagery, assets or colored layers.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of actionable elements that are placed on lighter imagery, assets or colored layers.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of actionable elements that are placed on lighter imagery, assets or colored layers.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of actionable elements that are placed on lighter imagery, assets or colored layers.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of actionable elements that are placed on darker imagery, assets or colored layers.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of actionable elements that are placed on darker imagery, assets or colored layers.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of actionable elements that are placed on darker imagery, assets or colored layers.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of actionable elements that are placed on darker imagery, assets or colored layers.

enabled.description: Used for the enabled state of interactable elements such as toggles, scrollbars etc.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of interactable elements such as toggles, scrollbars etc.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of interactable elements such as toggles, scrollbars etc.

default.description: Primary color background for non-interactable elements, sections, modals etc,

subdued.description: Subdued primary color background for non-interactable elements, sections, modals etc,

strong.description: Moderate primary color background for non-interactable elements, sections, modals etc,

enabled.description: Primary colored background for the enabled state of interactable elements.

hovered.description: Primary colored background for the hover state of interactable elements.

pressed.description: Primary colored background for the pressed state of interactable elements.

default.description: Default background color.

subdued.description: Background color for subtle distinction from the default background color.

strong.description: Background color for moderate distinction from the default background color.

inverted.description: Inverted default background color (e.g. for toast notifications).

enabled.description: Default background color for the enabled state of interactable elements.

hovered.description: Default background color for the hover state of interactable elements.

pressed.description: Default background color for the pressed state of interactable elements.

selected.description: Default background color for the pressed state of interactable elements.

disabled.description: Default background color for the disabled state of interactable elements.

default.description: Default or base layer of the layer stack used to manage visual hierarchy of background elements in a layout.

enabled.description: Used as enabled state of the 1st layer in the layer stack.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 1st layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 1st layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 1st layer in the layer stack.

enabled.description: Used as enabled state of the 2nd layer in the layer stack.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 2nd layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 2nd layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 2nd layer in the layer stack.

default.description: The 3rd layer in the layer stack and to be used behind the 2nd layer in the layer stack order.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 3rd layer in the layer stack.

default.description: The 4th layer in the layer stack and to be used behind the 3rd layer in the layer stack order.

enabled.description: Used as enabled state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

hovered.description: Used for the hover state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

pressed.description: Used for the pressed state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.

selected.description: Used for the selected state of the 4th layer in the layer stack.
